snippet.title: Mixed Reactions to Cheerios Dropping GMOs
snippet.description:
* Mixed Reactions to Cheerios Dropping GMOs . The sugar . One lesser-known ingredient is trisodium phosphate - a common and strong cleaning agent. Also a stain remover […] said: We switched from what we were using to non-GMO corn and non-GMO pure sugar cane. Below are echoes of the differing […] . Siemienas said: There is broad consensus that food containing GMOs is safe, but we decided to move forward with this in
15 weeks ago
